note: Interests: democracy, equality, science, space exploration, sports, history, books, opera, riding horses. He/him. Attorney. No statement I make in Mastodon is legal advice. Adjunct Professor of legal ethics at the Northwestern University School of Law. JD, MA, and BS degrees from NU. 2015-2021 Editor in Chief of the Newsletter of the Space Law Committee of the SciTech Section of the ABA. Former member of several non-profit boards of directors. 20 years of experience in DEI efforts.
